key_risks: Legal and ethical concerns including lawsuits and insider trading allegations
controversies: Multiple regulatory fines from FINRA, CME Group, and ICE
Lawsuit by Camelart Limited alleging improper liquidation of a commodities futures trading account
Former executive admitting to stealing trade secrets from a prior employer
social_issues: Ethical concerns related to insider trading and trade secret theft
governance_issues: Weak compliance systems leading to regulatory fines
Internal control issues highlighted by insider trading allegations
